attributes.action: Letters lost, misplaced and delayed by Royal mail
attributes.additional_details:
Responsible department: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills

Mail being lost, delayed or misplaced by Royal Mail has been on the increase.

This has led to a rise in the number of complaints

We want the government to get Royal Mail to agree decrease the number of lost Mail and the number of complaints from last year, with a steady decline over the coming years.
